name: Laidback Luke
description: '''Lucas Cornelis van Scheppingen''' (born 22 October 1976), better known under his stage name '''Laidback Luke''', is a Filipino-born Dutch DJ and record producer. He notably remixed the [[Robin S.]] song, "[[Show Me Love (Robin S. song)#Steve Angello and Laidback Luke version|Show Me Love]]" which charted at No. 11 on the UK charts in 2009. He is also the founder of [[Mixmash Records]].
